items.title: 60 dead after fire tears through Iraqi shopping centre, officials say
items.description: Clips circulating on social media appear to show a number of people on the roof during the fire.

items.title: Syria leader vows to protect Druze after sectarian violence prompts Israeli strikes
items.description: Ahmed al-Sharaa spoke after Israel said it would destroy government forces it accused of attacking Druze in Syria.

items.title: Samsung boss cleared of fraud by South Korea's top court
items.description: The ruling comes after Lee Jae-yong was acquitted of all charges in two earlier trials.

items.title: US says 'specific steps' agreed to end Syria violence after Israeli strikes hit Damascus
items.description: Israel says it is "working to save our Druze brothers", but Syria accuses it of "treacherous aggression".

items.title: Prosecutor in Diddy and Epstein cases fired by US justice department
items.description: It is not clear why Maurene Comey was removed from her job at the elite justice department office in Manhattan.
